attributes.action: Petitioning for a National Government to oversee the current political crisis.
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron not invoking Article 50 when he said he would immediately after a vote in favour of leaving the EU.

Both groups who campaigned for both sides on the EU referendum has been exposed as self serving opportunist politicians as evidenced by the exposure of their lies over the course of the events after the results of the EU referendum become apparent. 

It is pretty plain to see that there was no real contingency plans in place in lieu of a Leave vote being successful.
attributes.background:
Currently the government is in crisis because of the referendum on the EU and also because there are deep divisions in the two main political parties.

There needs to be a temporary cross-party National Government to oversee the process of leaving the EU and solve the current crisis
